alert.note: Alert for Rensselaer; Saratoga; Warren; Washington (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 26 at 3:18PM EDT until September 26 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albany has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Warren County in east central New York... Eastern Saratoga County in east central New York... Washington County in east central New York... Northern Rensselaer County in east central New York... Western Bennington County in southern Vermont... * Until 415 PM EDT. * At 317 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over North Ballston Spa, or near Saratoga Springs, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bennington, Saratoga Springs, Glens Falls, Hudson Falls, Mechanicville, Hoosick Falls, Arlington, Salem, Ballston Spa, Shaftsbury, Fort Edward, Corinth, Granville, Hartford, Cambridge, Greenwich, Round Lake, Country Knolls, North Ballston Spa and West Glens Falls. Please report hail size...damaging winds and reports of trees down to the National Weather Service by email at Alb.Stormreport@noaa.gov... On Facebook at www.facebook.com/nwsalbany or twitter @nwsalbany HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
